column2: "Are you tired? Yeah, I suppose so... I'm sorry for sending you all over the place!"
"But this time the info is really credible! I've got an Urgent Quest \"together with the wind and rain\"..."
"But the ARKS who tried for that quest ran into Mr. Umblla! Plus it was one or two people!"
"This is just my intuition, but I've got a feeling you'll run into Mr. Umblla!"
"Ah! If Mr. Umblla appears, you shouldn't attack him... We'd have a problem if he ran away scared!"
